meanings.definition: A person who is fearful or hateful of foreigners or strangers.
meanings.sent1: The xenophobe refused to interact with anyone from a different country.
meanings.sent2: The xenophobe's irrational fear of foreigners led to isolation.
meanings.sent3: The xenophobe thought aliens from outer space were less scary than people from other countries.
meanings.sent4: Her fear of strangers turned her into a xenophobe, building walls around her heart.
meanings.sent5: The xenophobe's hatred towards foreigners was palpable in every interaction.

meanings.definition: An individual who exhibits prejudice or discrimination against people from other countries.
meanings.sent1: The xenophobe's discriminatory remarks hurt many people from different lands.
meanings.sent2: Being a xenophobe, he refused to hire anyone who wasn't from his own country.
meanings.sent3: The xenophobe's idea of a 'foreign food' was anything not cooked by his mom.
meanings.sent4: Her prejudice turned her into a xenophobe, seeing enemies in every foreign face.
meanings.sent5: The xenophobe's discrimination against foreigners was evident in his biased actions.
